fields.customfield_12100:
Given an agent is trying to edit a client submitted through legacy / doesnt have any HS in MOD
When they are viewing the Hiring Sites page
Then they will not be able to edit Hiring Sites
And we will display a splash screen

Content:

*Temporarily Unable to Add Hiring Sites*

We are updating the process sot that you cannot add new hiring sites during this time period. You will need to add your client’s hiring sites in the new format when the new process is complete (USCISEM-658).

Zeplin Dashboard: https://app.zeplin.io/project.html#pid=57d9821c68b735b15c669b5d&dashboard

SECTION 4 DESIGN & IMPLEMENTATION (COMPLETE IF CR INCLUDES INFRASTRUCTURE CHANGES)

If the CR involves any infrastructure changes, such as VM, database, migration, or changes to any of the other fields listed in Section 4 for any environment, then Section 4 must be filled out in its entirety. The purpose of Section 4 is to capture the necessary information and requirements needed by the ESDO Infrastructure team and the data center support personnel required to install, connect and configure the infrastructure and services in the Enterprise Data Centers in support of ESDO projects.
fields.customfield_13434: Post Implementation
fields.customfield_13433:
Security

This section should be filled out by Security ONLY.
fields.customfield_13421:
Schedule Times

Schedule requests should be sufficient time to test staging and promote to production. Production maintenance hours are M-F 6pm–8am.
fields.description:
We need to research why the percentage of abandonment's is at the rate it is (normally around 30%). Work to brainstorm all the possible reasons for an abandonment. Brainstorm if we can track anything using Tag Manager that would give us more insight into this. Anything we can do with Google Analytics. Can we track users who do type in data verse those who dont?

Potential reasons for an abandonment:
* Network issues
* Users not having all the required info when they start the enrollment
* Naivgating to the application on accident

- Fix Funnel chart in GA
fields.summary: Research Reason for Abandonment Percentage (1/2 Day)
fields.customfield_14018:
Coordination

List 1) who you have coordinated with regarding the actual implementation of the change and 2) who you’ve coordinated with regarding the impact of the change ensuring a complete understanding of how the change may impact them. Include System Owner.
